name: @symphonyui/symphonycss
description: Symphony Anthology v1.0 - Semantic-first, framework-agnostic, AI-ready CSS framework with OKLCH colors, container queries, cascade layers, and zero-class baseline styling

scripts.build: npm run build:bundle && npm run build:minify && npm run build:themes
scripts.build:bundle: cat src/symphony.css src/core/_fonts.css src/core/_reset.css src/core/_variables.css src/core/_tokens.css src/core/_base.css src/layout/_container.css src/layout/_grid.css src/layout/_flexbox.css src/components/_typography.css src/components/_buttons.css src/components/_forms.css src/components/_cards.css src/components/_dialog.css src/components/_navigation.css src/components/_accordion.css src/components/_tables.css src/utilities/_spacing.css src/utilities/_helpers.css > dist/symphony.css
scripts.build:core: npm run build:core:bundle && npm run build:core:minify
scripts.build:core:bundle: cat src/symphony.css src/core/_fonts.css src/core/_reset.css src/core/_variables.css src/core/_tokens.css src/core/_base.css src/layout/_container.css src/layout/_grid.css src/layout/_flexbox.css src/components/_typography.css src/components/_buttons.css src/components/_forms.css src/components/_cards.css src/components/_dialog.css src/components/_navigation.css src/components/_accordion.css src/components/_tables.css src/utilities/_spacing.core.css src/utilities/_helpers.core.css > dist/symphony.core.css
scripts.build:themes: mkdir -p dist/themes/anthology && cat src/themes/anthology/_tokens.css src/themes/anthology/_components.css > dist/themes/anthology/anthology.css
scripts.size: echo 'Full Build:' && echo 'Minified:' && wc -c < dist/symphony.min.css && echo 'Gzipped:' && gzip -9 -c dist/symphony.min.css | wc -c
scripts.size:core: echo 'Core Build:' && echo 'Minified:' && wc -c < dist/symphony.core.min.css && echo 'Gzipped:' && gzip -9 -c dist/symphony.core.min.css | wc -c
scripts.size:compare: npm run size && echo '' && npm run size:core

author: SymphonyUI
